title: 'Got OG one!'
body: The Crocs Unisex-Adult Bayaband Flip Flip-Flops are a game-changer for comfort and style. These flip-flops combine the classic Crocs comfort with a sleek and modern design, making them perfect for any casual outing or lounging by the pool. The cushioned footbed provides unparalleled support and the durable material ensures they'll last, all while keeping your feet cool and comfortable. Whether you're a Crocs enthusiast or new to the brand, these flip-flops are a must-have addition to your summer footwear collection.

title: 'Good manufacturer'
body: 'Had ordered Men8 size. The hanger says M8 size but printed on flip flop M9-W11. But they fit me so keeping. These are manufactured in Vietnam for USA markets. Quality is superb. Liked the good non skid thread on sole. Straps are cast integral on sides so looks very tough bond. Straps are thick with smooth edges so will not abrade skin.'

title: 'Worst product and worst company is crocs'
body: I have bought this Chappel 3 months before from Amazon for my father to use at a price of 1400 plus. Within three months one of the chappels front leather got torn out as shown in the picture. Since it is only three months i claimed for a warranty from crocs side .they asked to mail the same. I mailed it to the official mail address with all the photos and the bill. They acknowledged the mail but there is no responses so far from crocs side. Amazon people told only crocs can help on this and they cannot do anything. With a price range of 1500 and a age of just 3 months how do they justify the price I don't know.literally the Sparx brand is better than crocs at a much lower price.
